channel.title: Auraeus - A new beginning
channel.description:
[b]Introduction:[/b] A lot of you know me, some might not. I've been around the community off and on for ~2 years. I recently decided to make a début back into programming, and complete an endeavour that I personally, have not completed before; a custom framework.
[b]Our Mission:[/b] The mission at Auraeus is fairly simple. An [b]OO[/b], abstracted framework which is highly commented, and very easy to understand.
[b]Our Current Team:[/b] - Myself - iz3 Legend - N/A
[b]Requirements:[/b] The requirements to join Auraeus are fairly simple. [b]1.[/b] You must have proof of YOUR own work. I will not accept anything based on Project Insanity [b]UNLESS[/b] it is up to a [b]HIGH[/b] par. As in, I don't want to see a Project Insanity with a few re-written skills and Hyperion's game-engine. [b]2.[/b] You must have at [b]LEAST[/b] _1_ year of Java knowledge. I don't want applications from someone looking for an easy project, or to learn as they go. You [b]MUST[/b] successfully pass a simple programming test. [b]3.[/b] You must be mature.
[b]Application Form:[/b] (ONLY FILL THIS OUT IF YOU MEET THE REQUIREMENTS). [code] Name: Age: Location: Time Zone: What do you hope to achieve being on this project?: How long are you able to work on this project?: On a scale of 1/100, how proficient would you be with Java?: On a scale of 1/10, how mature would you say you are?: Have you used Java for more than a year?: In YOUR own words, what does a static constructor do?: [/code]

item.title: Auraeus - A new beginning
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

Name: Age: 15 Location: Denison, Texas Time Zone: Central What do you hope to achieve being on this project?: To be honest, I've rarely worked with anything lower than 525, and I'm wanting to get into that lower revision. Plus, I don't see a team of complete idiots and jackasses who have to rely on other people just for a simple line of code. How long are you able to work on this project?: 5 hours weekdays, 10 hours weekends On a scale of 1/100, how proficient would you be with Java?: 60 On a scale of 1/10, how mature would you say you are?: 6 Have you used Java for more than a year?: Yes In YOUR own words, what does a static constructor do?: Well, I believe it's used (how I use it any way) to initialize static variables before the methods are called. I comprehend about 50% of what the Java docs say

Some proof of my work. This is old and my programming knowledge wasn’t as great as it is now.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Auraeus - A new beginning
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

Name: Dylan for now.

Age: 17.

Location: Ohio : United States.

Time Zone: Eastern Standard.

What do you hope to achieve being on this project?: Create a fast and stable base.

How long are you able to work on this project?: 2 - 3 hours a day.

On a scale of 1/100, how proficient would you be with Java?: 75

On a scale of 1/10, how mature would you say you are?: 8 at first, 5 after you get to know me.

Have you used Java for more than a year?: 3 years.

In YOUR own words, what does a static constructor do?: Executes static content when the class is referenced, can only be called once.

My Past Frameworks And One Highly Rewritten Project:

item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

@kidgoku4522: That is a static constructor. And a requirement is 1 year + of Java experience. And finally, we are looking for members whom already know Java, and not to further their development Skills. DENIED sorry, you just won’t be of use to us. Good luck elsewhere!.

static {
}

@Arcik: You seem like you know a fair bit. But the just passing time thing kind of scares me. I’d like you to know that you’re ACCEPTED. Talk to me on skype.

Like that.

Introduction: A lot of you know me, some might not. I’ve been around the community off and on for ~2 years. I recently decided to make a début back into programming, and complete an endeavour that I personally, have not completed before; a custom framework.

Our Mission: The mission at Auraeus is fairly simple. An OO, abstracted framework which is highly commented, and very easy to understand.

Our Current Team:

  • Myself
  • iz3 Legend
  • N/A

Requirements: The requirements to join Auraeus are fairly simple.
1. You must have proof of YOUR own work. I will not accept anything based on Project Insanity UNLESS it is up to a HIGH par. As in, I don’t want to see a Project Insanity with a few re-written skills and Hyperion’s game-engine.
2. You must have at LEAST 1 year of Java knowledge. I don’t want applications from someone looking for an easy project, or to learn as they go. You MUST successfully pass a simple programming test.
3. You must be mature.
